<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 464, 808, 481]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 497, 478, 511]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 513, 361, 527]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 529, 483, 544]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 546, 335, 559]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 562, 466, 576]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 577, 664, 608]]<|/det|>
